def_cn: (尤指发展中国家的)部落，部族(一些人不赞成此用法)
def_en: Tribe is sometimes used to refer to a group of people of the same race, language, and customs, especially in a developing country. Some people disapprove of this use.

def_cn: (从事相同活动或行为相同的)一伙(人)，一帮(人)
def_en: You can use tribe to refer to a group of people who are all doing the same thing or who all behave in the same way.
